com.agenarisk.api.util

Class Advisory.AdvisoryGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agenarisk.api.util.Advisory.AdvisoryGroup
  • Enclosing class:
    Advisory

    public static class Advisory.AdvisoryGroup
extends Object
    AdvisoryGroup instance is associated with a number of Threads and is abstractly associated with some particular job (which is potentially multi-threaded).
    AdvisoryGroup class is thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AdvisoryGroup(Object key) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessage(Advisory.AdvisoryMessage message)
      Adds an AdvisoryMessage to this AdvisoryGroup.
      Set<Thread> getGroupThreads()
      Returns the Set of Threads linked to this AdvisoryGroup.
      Warning: modifying this Set directly will affect the workings of the Advisory and is NOT recommended.
      protected Object getKey()
      Getter for AdvisoryGroup key
      List<Advisory.AdvisoryMessage> getMessages()
      Returns the List of AdvisoryMessages for this AdvisoryGroup.
      Warning: modifying this List directly will affect the workings of the Advisory and is NOT recommended.
      boolean isLinkedTo(Thread thread)
      Checks if this AdvisoryGroup is linked to the provided Thread.
      void linkToThread(Thread thread)
      Links the provided Thread to this AdvisoryGroup.
      void unlinkThread(Thread thread)
      Unlinks provided Thread from this AdvisoryGroup

    • Method Detail

      • linkToThread

        public void linkToThread(Thread thread)
        Links the provided Thread to this AdvisoryGroup.
        Parameters:
        thread - Thread to link to this AdvisoryGroup
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the provided Thread is already linked to another AdvisoryGroup

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(Advisory.AdvisoryMessage message)
        Adds an AdvisoryMessage to this AdvisoryGroup.
        Parameters:

      • isLinkedTo

        public boolean isLinkedTo(Thread thread)
        Checks if this AdvisoryGroup is linked to the provided Thread.
        Parameters:
        thread - Thread to check
        Returns:
        true if the provided Thread is linked to this AdvisoryGroup and false otherwise

      • getMessages

        public List<Advisory.AdvisoryMessage> getMessages()
        Returns the List of AdvisoryMessages for this AdvisoryGroup.
        Warning: modifying this List directly will affect the workings of the Advisory and is NOT recommended.
        Returns:
        List of AdvisoryMessages for this AdvisoryGroup

      • getGroupThreads

        public Set<Thread> getGroupThreads()
        Returns the Set of Threads linked to this AdvisoryGroup.
        Warning: modifying this Set directly will affect the workings of the Advisory and is NOT recommended.
        Returns:
        Set of Threads linked to this AdvisoryGroup
